<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Impossible Lands

</column>

Staying alive among the scheming, ravenous undead of Geb required a deep knowledge of their motivations, capabilities, and weaknesses. More often than not, it also required the ability to weave alibis and life-preserving half-truths capable of swaying a stilled heart.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Charisma
or Constitution, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) skill, and the [Undead Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Charming Liar](/Feats.aspx?ID=766) skill feat.
